about_the_game:
Is your RPG in dire need of dozens of colourful characters? Look no further, the

TinyRPG - Character Pack I is here to tend to your needs!

 

In this pack one will find:

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 

【Characters (40 sheets)】

              ・Fighters (7 sheets);

              ・Bandits (5 sheets);

              ・Healers (5 sheets);

              ・Mages (5 sheets);

              ・Nobles (5 sheets);

              ・Villagers (5 sheets);

              ・Heroes (3 sheets);

              ・Merchants (3 sheets);

              ・Battle Mages (2 sheets);

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Is your RPG in dire need of dozens of colourful characters? Look no further, the

TinyRPG - Character Pack I is here to tend to your needs!

 

In this pack one will find:

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 

【Characters (40 sheets)】

              ・Fighters (7 sheets);
